column2: §Y*§! Can only declare Holy Wars against non-Dharmic religions\n§Y*§! Slavery is allowed
Rulers follow the Hellenic principles of syncretism and meritocracy\n§Y*§! Slavery is allowed
column3: Les seigneurs suivent les principes helléniques du syncrétisme et de la méritocratie

column6: Los gobernantes siguen los principios helénicos de sincretismo y meritocracia

column2: Religious Taxes and monastic traditions are enforced\n§Y*§! Slavery is allowed
